metadata.description: Invigo Marketplace - A curated collection of Claude Code plugins for enhanced development workflows

plugins.name: invigo-agents
plugins.description: A collection of 23 specialized AI agents for software development, plus skills including skill-creator and feature-planner (TDD-based phase planning with quality gates).

plugins.description: BITDA ERP development workflow: 9 skills (planning, UI design, review, deployment, Notion registration) + 4 agents (UI supervision, Playwright testing)
